text: right He Qigong () (1898–1955) was a Chinese educator and Kuomintang politician of the Republic of China. He was born in Anqing, Anhui. He was the 16th Republic-era mayor of Beijing (called Beiping during his tenure). ==Bibliography== * * * Category:1898 births Category:1955 deaths Category:Republic of China politicians from Anhui Category:Mayors of Beijing Category:Members of the Kuomintang Category:Educators from Anhui Category:People from Tongcheng, Anhui Category:Politicians from Anqing
title: He Qigong
